title: Canvas Drawing with Fallback
description: Provide a <canvas> drawing example with width/height attributes and an accessible fallback message inside the element.
solution:
<canvas id="c" width="300" height="150">Your browser does not support canvas.</canvas>
<script>
const c=document.getElementById('c');
const ctx=c.getContext('2d');
ctx.fillStyle='#8ab'; ctx.fillRect(10,10,100,100);
ctx.fillStyle='white'; ctx.font='16px sans-serif'; ctx.fillText('Canvas',20,60);
</script>
hints: Set width/height attributes on canvas (not only CSS) and provide fallback content.
